value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.title: ALL vs ALLSelected in Power BI and DAX
value.excerpt: These two functions in DAX are often used instead of each other; ALL and ALLSELECTED. Their behavior can be similar in some contexts, but it can also be different in other contexts. value.title: Combining Tables in Power BI   Union Except and Intersect in DAX
value.excerpt: Power Query is often the engine used for combining data tables, especially using Merge or Append. However, sometimes, you might need to do that operation in DAX. An example of that is when you want to create that combination only virtually as part of a measure calculation that evaluates dynamically.
